trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Sandusky
There were no other sightings in Sandusky on or around April 3rd 2013
divs: sighting detailsi was just leaving the house for work around 9:30pm. it was a saturday.i noticed out of the corner of my right eye a light. i looked up thinking to see a street light but what i was seeing was through the trees. i ran north for about two blocks until the trees were gone. what i seen was something like non other ive ever seen. there were five lights\objects all together. a cluster of three and a cluster of two.the lights werent blinking it was more a pulse from red to oarange to yellow.they hovered for a minute not doing anything to my ne right over ceader point. then all of a sudden they moved alittle to the left and took off in the clouds to my right. i dont know all the airplanes flying the skys.. but i know the ones im used to seeing and it was nothing like that. also they werent helecopters because they were close enough to where id hear five helecopters.. no sound... my camera wouldnt even pick up the lights.. everone later thought i was crazy.oh also it was a very cloudy night.
Summary: Looked up to NE and seen 2 clutters. One of 3 and one of 2. Pulsated slowly
